contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 2, 1979 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 7 bands competed.
Jan. 7, 2015, 7:53 p.m. June 22, 2016, 3:24 p.m.
1 Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths Sinfonietta [Wilson]
2 Mossley Band Roy Waite Rhapsody for Brass Band
3 Hade Edge Jack Fisher Triumphant Rhapsody
Unknown Result Hepworth Band Peter Wadsworth Diadem of Gold
Unknown Result Bradford Victoria Brian Dyson Second Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals
Unknown Result Grange Moor Brass Band Garry Beresford Three Impressions For Brass Op. 36
Unknown Result Boarshurst Silver Band Bryan Garside Sinfonietta for Brass Band - The Wayfarer
Withdrawn Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band John Iredale
